detail_desc: Jumper in textured-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Fully lined sports bra in extra-sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric that shapes and sculpts the bust. Removable inserts, a racer back and a wide, double-layered hem with a scalloped edge. Extra firm support.

Long dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a deep V-neck that has a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the bottom. Gathers at the shoulders for a gentle draping effect, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication at the waist, and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and classic front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a chest pocket, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short imitation leather skirt with a visible zip at the back. Unlined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood, small embroidered motif on the front and kangaroo pocket. Long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Straight trousers in soft, textured-knit jersey with a wide cotton jersey waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Thin, stylish rings in shiny, gold-plated metal.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Knee-length skirt in sturdy jersey made from a viscose blend with concealed elastication at the top and a slit at the back.
Wide trousers in an airy, patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Fully lined shaping swimsuit that has a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and bum. Wrapover top, lightly padded cups, support panels, decorative gathers in the sides, and adjustable shoulder straps.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of leggings and hat in organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a print motif on the front, lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist. Hat with a decorative knot detail at the top and sewn-in turn-up at the hem.

Short dress in woven fabric with embroidered details, a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and scalloped edges around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.

Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in soft superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 2-12Y), and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets,real back pockets and narrow hems.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.
Multi-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs, two with a pendant. Adjustable length, 38-46 cm.
Short hooded top in printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, one back pocket and contrasting colour stripes down the sides. Mesh inner shorts.

Long, padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, padded hood, and two-way zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a concealed press-stud and one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a concealed drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Hard smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.

Fitted top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with a sheen. V-neck, a double-layered wrapover at the top and a seam under the bust. Long, wide sleeves with gathered elastication at the shoulders and smocking at the cuffs.
Waist belt in imitation suede with a tortoiseshell-patterned buckle at the front. Width 5 cm.

Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and a lined hood with a wrapover front. Long raglan sleeves with contrasting colour sections on the shoulders, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Fitted, knee-length dress in sturdy jersey with short cap sleeves and a decorative buckle at the front of the waist. Zip at the back and a short slit at the hem. Unlined.

Short, sleeveless dress in a soft Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, button placket and flap chest pockets. Yoke with a pleat at the back, a seam with a drawstring and ties under the bust, welt side pockets and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved Henley tops in soft cotton jersey.
Patterned bikini. Top with a flounce over one shoulder and a narrow strap over the other shoulder. Partly lined. Matching, fully lined bikini bottoms.
Derby shoes with pointed toes and lacing at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and smooth soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Cropped top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist and lined gusset.
Boxy top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

prod_name: SS body mixed single LOW price
detail_desc: Short-sleeved bodysuit in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Sandals with an adjustable ankle strap. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Small shoulder bag in imitation leather with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and a zip at the top. Lined. Size approx. 11.5x16 cm.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x190 cm.
Jersey sports jacket with a brushed thermal inside, lined hood and long raglan sleeves with taped details. Zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Set in soft organic cotton. Dungaree dress in sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket and adjustable press-stud fastenings at the front. Soft brushed inside. Long-sleeved bodysuit in patterned jersey with a decorative picot trim around the neckline and cuffs, and press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Calf-length dress in jacquard-weave viscose with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and seam at the waist. Long sleeves with wide cuffs and covered buttons. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Metal earrings in various geometric shapes with marbled, stone-like details in plastic. Length from approx. 3 cm to 7 cm.

Short-sleeved shirt in a stretch cotton weave with a narrow grandad collar and classic front. Sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves, yoke and darts at the back and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders, tapered sleeves and an accentuated waist to create a flattering silhouette.
Leggings in sturdy cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Gloves in supple leather with ribbed cuffs. Lined in a soft wool blend.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with short, flounced sleeves and a wide neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Seam with wide elastication and ties at the waist. Unlined.
Long, fitted dress in heavily draping, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend. Narrow-cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Single-breasted jacket in stretch cotton velvet with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Fastening with one button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, a metal fastening at the front and a lace trim at the hem.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with lightly padded cups with removable inserts, double adjustable shoulder straps and a racer back. Seamless. Light support.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed cuffs and hems.
Slippers in soft fabric with a bow at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles, and soft soles with anti-slip protectors.

Soft nursing bras in lace and microfibre with opening, cotton-lined cups with space for nursing pads. Slightly wider, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
V-neck blouse in a crinkled weave with a sheen. Wrapover front with covered buttons at one side and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a sheen. Deep neckline front and back and long sleeves.
Mesh trainers with rubber details, lacing at the front, and a loop front and back. Mesh linings and insoles, and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
T-shirt in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and straight-cut hem.
Wide, checked twill suit trousers in a wool blend with two pairs of concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. The trousers are in a loose fit with side pockets and straight legs.
Two-strand thin metal chain necklace. One of the chains has small round pendants and the other has one large pendant. Adjustable length 40-47.5 cm.
Hi-tops with lacing at the front, a padded top edge and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey with a tie detail at the front of the hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Slip-on trainers in patterned cotton canvas with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. No lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with narrow crossover elastic straps at the front and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Textured-knit wool jumper with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.
Jersey-lined pull-on trousers in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with elasticated ribbing and a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and elasticated ribbing at the hems.
Set with a patterned bow tie and braces. Adjustable elasticated braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details. Pre-tied bow tie in satin with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Cropped top in light sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs and raw-edge hem.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Calf-length cargo trousers in soft cotton twill with an elasticated, drawstring waist and a short frill trim at the top. Side and leg pockets and elasticated hems. Jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Fabric trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
